name: Battlefantasy
description:
A short turn-based RPG game where you will do only one thing: BATTLE!

 

How to Play

>Mouse<

  • (Left Click) - OK/Confirm          
  • (Right Click) - Cancel/Enter Menu

>Keyboard<

  • Go to "Options" --> "Keyboard Config" for configuration

>Smartphone<

  • (Single Tap) - OK/Confirm          
  • (Tap with two fingers) - Cancel/Enter Menu

 

Warning: This game requires a device which supports WebGL 2.0 for optimal performance. If you are not sure if your device supports it, please visit the website webglreport.com for more information. 
If you are playing the game on an old device, the game may run slow. To fix this you can try to turn "ON" the "Synch Monitor FPS" in the "Options" menu.
However this option may also crash your game, so GOOD LUCK!!!
